## VertexBlockNode.getSerializationCls() method

Gets the serialization descriptor for this node type

**Signature:**

```typescript

```
**Returns:**

[SerializableClass](doc/markdown/./scene.serializableclass.md)

## Remarks

No additional properties need to be serialized beyond the base node data and input connections.
